data.name: Warface - Jungle Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
This package contains the following items:

  • Jungle weapons for all classes: H&K G36K, Cobray Striker, H&K MP7, Dragunov SR;
  • 45-day VIP bonus (100% XP Reward Boost, 50% Arsenal Unlock Boost, 75% Money Reward Boost);
  • All Guerilla body skins;
  • 2000 Kredits.

If you purchase this pack, you get 190% more item value than you would buying the items separately.

The “Jungle” option is designed for those who want to crush their enemies and do it in style. It provides you with a 45-day VIP bonus, 2000 Kredits and comes in two variants. This one has Guerrilla body skins and Jungle weapons.

MORE ABOUT THE WEAPONS:


Assault rifle - H&K G36K. H&K G36K is a powerful assault rifle with one of the highest aimed accuracy values in the game. The Jungle model has improved specifications. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions, scopes and rail modifications available.

Shotgun – Cobray Striker. Cobray Striker is a prominent shotgun famous for its outstanding rate of fire and a large 12-gauge cartridge. The Jungle model has improved specifications. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions and scopes modifications available.

SMG – H&K MP7. H&K MP7 is a submachine gun chosen for its impressive rate of fire and quick reload. This may influence the spread though, that is why it is mostly used in close quarters. The Jungle model has slightly improved accuracy. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions and scopes modifications available.

Sniper rifle – Dragunov SR. Dragunov SR is one of the most renowned sniper weapons in the world, a must-have for every aspiring marksman. The Jungle model has vastly improved damage and makes this classic rifle even more reliable. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions, scopes and rail modifications available. Looking for challenges? Unlock custom achievements with this weapon!

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese*, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
